thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great reception staff
thread.title_full: Great reception staff - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah G
title: Great reception staff
text: Came here for my sons birthday on a museum trip. On arriving the reception team could not have been friendlier. Felt really welcome. There was a treat for us in the room and the room was a lovely size. Unfortunately the bathroom and breakfast let it down a bit which i have since spoken to the hotel about and received a very nice response. The location was brilliant for gloucester road tube, restaurants and museums. I felt the hotel was a bit overpriced but i would stay again due to location and amazing staff.
